definition.text: Yes! Some of them are plugins shipping with the system and some are your own!

paragraphs.text: As soon as you start using the system, the workspace is saved every minute. It is also saved before closing the browser or browser tab, and you may save it manually too using the Ctrl + Shift + Key-S keys.
When a plugin workspace is modified in any way, a copy is stored in your My-Workspaces folder.
Plugin files may not be modified from within the system!
